name: Youtube & AfreecaTv Anti Spoiler
description:
Enjoy your e-sport matches/Movies without knowing the time and the results by avoiding the likes/unlikes of the Video. Special for e-sport like:
  • Starcraft
  • Lol
  • Counter Strike
  • You name it!

    • Controls ( VERY IMPORTANT):

  • First step: Click on the video screen to set the controls up, now:
  • To adjust the volume: Use arrows keyboard (UP and DOWN)
  • To control and move forward/backwards: Use Arrows keyboard (LEFT and RIGHT). In order to move forward several minutes Hold the right arrow key
  • Another way To control and move forward/backwards: Numbers. For example If you press 5, you will be watching the 50% of the video. If you press 3, you will be watching the 30% of the game. I dont recommend to use Numbers tho use right key to avoid spoilers
    • Enjoy it!
